name.ja: <ruby>Ｍ∀ＬＩＣＥ<rt>マリス</rt></ruby> <ruby>ＩＮ<rt>イン</rt></ruby> <ruby>ＵＮＤＥＲＧＲＯＵＮＤ<rt>アンダーグラウンド</rt></ruby>

text.en: When this is activated: You can banish 1 "M∀LICE" card from your hand, Deck, or GY. While you have 3 or more banished "M∀LICE" Traps with different names, "M∀LICE" Link Monsters you control gain 3000 ATK. While you control any "M∀LICE" Link Monsters, your opponent's monsters can only target those monsters for attacks. You can only activate 1 "M∀LICE IN UNDERGROUND" per turn.
